HomePage.name: Emre E.
HomePage.title: Computer Engineer • Full Stack Developer • Backend Enjoyer

AboutPage.title: Who Am I?
AboutPage.content:
Hi, I’m Emre. I’m on my journey to becoming a **Full Stack Developer** and actively improving myself in both **Backend** and **Frontend** development. I live in Istanbul, Turkey.
Since my early years, I have been fascinated by how the applications I used actually worked. This curiosity led me into the world of software development, and over time I realized that it was not just a hobby but a field in which I wanted to build my career.
With this motivation, I began studying **Computer Engineering** at university, and I am now only one course away from graduating. Throughout my studies, I strengthened my theoretical foundation and developed various projects to put this knowledge into practice.
Although I initially focused on **Backend** technologies, I gradually became interested in **Frontend** development as well, which guided me toward becoming a **Full Stack developer**.
I am currently focused on improving my skills, learning new technologies, and seeking **internship** or **job** opportunities where I can contribute and continue to grow within a team.
